description:
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers Adult Red Power Ranger Costume includes:
  • Jumpsuit
  • Helmet
  • Gloves

More on Mighty Morphin Power Rangers Adult Red Power Ranger Costume: Go Red Ranger go! This Red Power Ranger Costume includes a red jumpsuit with diamond panel detailing. Slip on the white gloves and the two-piece Power Ranger helmet to complete your Mighty Morphin look. Shoes not included.

Materials:

  • 100% polyester

Care instructions:

  • Hand wash cold, line dry

Officially licensed Saban Might Morphin Power Rangers costume.
name: Adult Red Power Ranger Costume - Mighty Morphin Power Rangers

description:
Adult Red Power Ranger Partysuit includes:

  • Jumpsuit
  • Detachable belt
  • Double zipper

Officially licensed ©SCG Power Rangers LLC. costume.

More on Red Power Ranger Partysuit: It's much easier to go, go! in this Red Ranger Partysuit! Featuring the signature classic Power Ranger design, this one-piece Red Power Ranger costume is a whole-body suit made of thin, breathable spandex that covers your entire body — including hands, face and feet. The detachable belt completes your Red Power Ranger look. Stretchy and comfortable, this unique Red Ranger costume is designed to allow easy breathing and visibility, with a double zipper for quick and convenient in and out. If you are shorter than 5'4", choose Medium. If you are between 5'4" and 5'10", choose Large. If you are between 5'10" and 6'3", choose XLarge. If you are over 6'3", choose XXLarge.

Materials:

  • Poly-spandex

Care instructions:

  • Hand wash, line dry
name: Adult Red Power Ranger Partysuit - Mighty Morphin Power Rangers

description:
Save the galaxy in our Drax the Destroyer Muscle Costume! This printed jumpsuit features padded arms and torso, and a print of Drax's red detailed chest so you can have an intimidating, muscular physique without hitting the gym. Boot tops printed right on the legs means all you need are regular black shoes for this look. With the highly detailed, molded gray face mask, you're ready to exact revenge!

Adult Drax the Destroyer Muscle Costume includes:

  • Muscle jumpsuit
  • Mask

Hand wash cold. Dry flat.

Officially licensed ©Marvel Guardians of the Galaxy™ costume.
name: Adult Drax the Destroyer Muscle Costume - Guardians of the Galaxy

description:
Jump into the fray as the intergalactic outlaw-turned-hero with our Star-Lord Costume! Look the part of a galaxy guardian in the long dusty red coat with snap closures and decorative wraps on the shoulder and sleeve just like the suit worn in the Guardians of the Galaxy film. Leather-look gloves and a molded plastic face mask are also included to transform you into Peter Quill, Star-Lord!

description:
Are you strong enough? Our Mr. Incredible Muscle Costume is perfect for busting through walls and listening to the police scanner. Featuring a red and black stretchy jumpsuit with muscular padding and the signature "I" emblem, this superhero costume has you looking like the beloved family man and hero! Top off your superhero look with the black gloves, face mask and attached boot covers. Just like Edna insisted, there is no cape.

  • Gloves

description:
You're ready to take on Superman with this Light-Up Batman Accessory Kit. Inspired by his look in Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice, this Batman accessory kit includes a light-up mask and matching gloves. The eye holes are lined with white lights that glow just like Batman's do in classic comics. With elastic bands and hook-and-loop closure this Dawn of Justice Batman mask stays securely in place. Our Deluxe Joker Costume features a long, purple jacket with wide lapels and pocket flaps on the sides and an attached collar shirt. A printed tie, green vest with faux buttons and purple pinstripe pants complete your villainous Joker Costume as seen in The Dark Knight. Conceal that oh-so-serious look on your face with the included Joker mask featuring painted details and large cutout eyeholes.

Straight from the asylum wardrobe, The Dark Knight Joker Costume features a signature purple velour overcoat with an attached green vest, shirt, and tie. Completing the character is a "late model" overhead Joker mask with attached synthetic fiber hair and crudely applied makeup, because the Joker's much less careful with his lipstick than he used to be.
